languages.text: {n}Висирь виновато склоняет голову.{/n} "Завет Паутины таков. Мы иного не ведаем, не научены жить иначе. Путь, что проделал{mf||а} ты, есть путь, что даровал Неумирающий. И потому мы решили, что так сможем почтить тебя".

{n}The Vizsier bows his head guiltily.{/n} "Such are the Tenets of the Web. They are all we have ever known and the only life we have learned to live. The path you walked was a gift from the Undying One. And so we decided that was how we were to honour you."
languages.original_text: {n}Висирь виновато склоняет голову.{/n} "Завет Паутины таков. Мы иного не ведаем, не научены жить иначе. Путь, что проделал{mf||а} ты, есть путь, что даровал Неумирающий. И потому мы решили, что так сможем почтить тебя".

{n}The Vizsier bows his head guiltily.{/n} "Such are the Tenets of the Web. They are all we have ever known and the only life we have learned to live. The path you walked was a gift from the Undying One. And so we decided that was how we were to honour you."

languages.text: {n}Der Wesir senkt schuldbewusst den Kopf.{/n} "Das sind die Grundsätze des Netzes. Wir kannten nie etwas anderes, wir haben nur dieses Leben zu führen gelernt. Der Pfad, den Ihr beschritten habt, war ein Geschenk des Todlosen. Und so haben wir entschieden, dass wir Euch auf diese Weise ehren werden."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier bows his head guiltily.{/n} "Such are the Tenets of the Web. They are all we have ever known and the only life we have learned to live. The path you walked was a gift from the Undying One. And so we decided that was how we were to honour you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Wesir senkt schuldbewusst den Kopf.{/n} "Das sind die Grundsätze des Netzes. Wir kannten nie etwas anderes, wir haben nur dieses Leben zu führen gelernt. Der Pfad, den Ihr beschritten habt, war ein Geschenk des Todlosen. Und so haben wir entschieden, dass wir Euch auf diese Weise ehren werden."

languages.text: {n}El Visir agacha la cabeza con culpabilidad.{/n} «Tal es la Doctrina de la Red. Es todo lo que hemos conocido y la única vida que hemos aprendido a llevar. La senda que ha recorrido es un regalo del Inmortal, y decidimos que con ella l{mf|e|a} honraríamos».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier bows his head guiltily.{/n} "Such are the Tenets of the Web. They are all we have ever known and the only life we have learned to live. The path you walked was a gift from the Undying One. And so we decided that was how we were to honour you."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Visir agacha la cabeza con culpabilidad.{/n} «Tal es la Doctrina de la Red. Es todo lo que hemos conocido y la única vida que hemos aprendido a llevar. La senda que ha recorrido es un regalo del Inmortal, y decidimos que con ella l{mf|e|a} honraríamos».

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールは後ろめたげに頭を下げる。{/n}「それがウェブの教義の道だ。我らが知るすべてであり、学んだ唯一の生き方だ。あなたが歩んだ道は、不死の者からの贈り物であった。故に、我らはあなたに敬意を表することを決めたのです」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier bows his head guiltily.{/n} "Such are the Tenets of the Web. They are all we have ever known and the only life we have learned to live. The path you walked was a gift from the Undying One. And so we decided that was how we were to honour you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールは後ろめたげに頭を下げる。{/n}「それがウェブの教義の道だ。我らが知るすべてであり、学んだ唯一の生き方だ。あなたが歩んだ道は、不死の者からの贈り物であった。故に、我らはあなたに敬意を表することを決めたのです」

languages.text: {n}宿老愧疚地低下了头。{/n}“这便是织血罗网的教义。这是我们所知道的一切，也是我们唯一了解的生活方式。您走过的路是不死之神赐予您的礼物，所以我们认为，我们应该以这种方式向您致以敬意。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier bows his head guiltily.{/n} "Such are the Tenets of the Web. They are all we have ever known and the only life we have learned to live. The path you walked was a gift from the Undying One. And so we decided that was how we were to honour you."

traits.locale_text: {n}宿老愧疚地低下了头。{/n}“这便是织血罗网的教义。这是我们所知道的一切，也是我们唯一了解的生活方式。您走过的路是不死之神赐予您的礼物，所以我们认为，我们应该以这种方式向您致以敬意。”

languages.text: {n}Le vizir baisse la tête d'un air coupable.{/n} « Tels sont les Préceptes de la Toile. C'est tout ce que nous avons toujours connu et la seule vie que nous ayons jamais appris à mener. Le chemin que vous avez parcouru était un don de l'Immortel et nous avons donc décidé de vous rendre hommage de cette façon. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier bows his head guiltily.{/n} "Such are the Tenets of the Web. They are all we have ever known and the only life we have learned to live. The path you walked was a gift from the Undying One. And so we decided that was how we were to honour you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vizir baisse la tête d'un air coupable.{/n} « Tels sont les Préceptes de la Toile. C'est tout ce que nous avons toujours connu et la seule vie que nous ayons jamais appris à mener. Le chemin que vous avez parcouru était un don de l'Immortel et nous avons donc décidé de vous rendre hommage de cette façon. »

languages.text: {n}Vezir, suçluluk içinde başını eğiyor.{/n} "Ağ'ın İlkeleri böyle buyurur. Tüm bildiğimiz onlardır ve hayatımızı yaşamayı bir tek böyle biliriz. Yürüdüğünüz yol, Ölmeyen'den bir armağandı. Biz de sizi böyle onurlandıracağımıza karar verdik."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier bows his head guiltily.{/n} "Such are the Tenets of the Web. They are all we have ever known and the only life we have learned to live. The path you walked was a gift from the Undying One. And so we decided that was how we were to honour you."
